The Portal quacked for a moment as a small ship broke the barrier... 
the piolet checked his charts and began making preps for 
landing... "It seems i've made it a bit to early wouldn't you say?

The small character beside him nodded and watched as the earth came 
closer into view. 

"I wonder if the ark is still secure... No matter, we do what we do 
best, were here for a purpose CrossWase, We stick to the mission." 
As 
the ship entered the atmosphere the piolet hit the cloaker and the 
ships entry was hidden from view. "Time to get to work." As soon as 
the ship touched down in the forrest the main door burst open as 
Motorcycle and driver burst out and tore across the ground... A 
Decepticon Symbol emblayzed across the windshield... 

The Driver was dressed from head to toe in black leather and his 
face 
was covered by a helmet, He whistled and the Bike laughed.

"Dangerouse driving like this?" He smiled inward to himself. "You 
still have alot to learn about me boys, our my name isn't..." He 
jumped a stump and landed in a field heading towards predicon 
territory... "SIDEWAYS."

Starstorm:
 
Starstorm broke the kiss "Listen!!!"she fell in silence and 
said "Have you hear that, Night Viper???? it seems that someone is 
goin to our base!!!"

NightViper:

NightViper transformed and pulled out his crossbow and began to walk 
towards the direction the noise was coming from... Suddenly A 
Motorcycle burst through the bushes. NightViper flung himself on 
Starstorm, his head sliding back to the hidden area leaving his flat 
head. "Get down!"

Starstorm:

"What the pit....!!!?" said the femme while she did what NightViper 
said

SideWays:

The Bike stopped kicking up sand... "Heh, sorry bout that..." The 
rider stepped off and walked over offering his hand to help them up. 
He was clad in all black leather with a helmet with its visor 
blocking the viwe of who the driver was...

Starstorm:

If were Night Viper who helped her to stood up she would accepted, 
but he was an stranger and she stood up and said without 
tone "Who're you?, what'er you doing here?"

NightViper

NightViper stood hssssing.

SideWays:

The rider turned to the bike as it transformed into a Bot and a tiny 
head with green goggles for eyes. "The names Sideways" 

Starstorm:

"Can we know what're you doing on our territory?"replied the femme 
trying to not offend the newcomer, he seemed like a guy who could 
get easely mad
